entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Delta
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:01 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 07:01 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow or ice pellets. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:01 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
